entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
